description: SDLPROJ files are the main file type used by Trados Studio. The projects contain all the files, such as .DOC , .DOCX , or .XML files, needed to be translated and reviewed. You can open an SDLPROJ by selecting File → Open Project . You can create an SDLPROJ by selecting File → New → New Project and choose to start from scratch or template ( .SDLTPL file).

SDLPROJ files can be saved as .SDLPPX packages for better organization and easier sharing with other team members. You can create an SDLPPX file using the "Create Project Package" wizard in SDL Trados Studio. To do this, select Create Project Package in the toolbar. You can also right-click projects you want in the package and select Create Project Package .
